https://tmrev.io/movie/377153-A Lullaby to the Sorrowful Mystery 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2EODet7CLf62h8GJnvEx2OlWj78.jpg Andrés Bonifacio is celebrated as the father of the Philippines Revolution against Spanish colonial rule. This eight-hour epic examines this myth, undertaking an expedition into history through various interwoven narrative threads, held together by an exploration of the individual’s role in history. A Lullaby to the Sorrowful Mystery
